titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of, and answered unto, by the church-wardens and side-men of every parish in the triennial visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God, Thomas, Lord Bishop of St. David. In the fifth year of his consecration.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Saint David's. Bishop (1687-1699 : Watson)
